translations: 选举程序；议员竟选演说坛

sentences.sentence: Most candidates will be out on the hustings this week.
sentences.translation: 大多数候选人本星期将进行竞选活动。

sentences.sentence: Now do not let them lure you to the hustings my dear Mr. Brooke.
sentences.translation: 听着，亲爱的布鲁克先生，别让人家牵着鼻子走，把你骗上讲台。

sentences.sentence: She has agreed, though, to attend one of the election hustings, in Chiswick a week before the election.
sentences.translation: 她已答应将参加大选前一周在奇西克举行的一个选举演说会。
